# style

**Interface Property**

The visual presentation for the selection accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
style?: PlaceSelectionAccessoryStyle;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PlaceSelectionAccessory/style] for the available selection accessory styles.
